4.3. jset

class nettoolkit.jset.JSet(input_file=None, input_list=None)

Bases: nettoolkit.gpl.Default, nettoolkit.gpl.STR, nettoolkit.gpl.Container

Juniper Standard to set converter

property objVar

Parameters

read_input_list(input_list)

Parameters

  • input_file (i/o) – input text file i/o

  • input_list (list, tuple) – input in format of list or tuple

property to_set
